New Records: USA tied the match in a Super Over
Saurabh Netravalkar took 2 for 18 in his four overs
Key Match Events: Super Over finish with USA winning 18-13
Pakistan's fielding issues leading to extras
Key wickets taken by Netravalkar and Kenjige
High-pressure moments in the Super Over
Post-Match Reflections: USA's victory was a significant achievement
Pakistan's captain admitted to not meeting bowling standards
Miscellaneous Highlights: Match was the 11th in Group A
USA's first major giant-killing on the global stage
Others: USA needed 49 runs off the last over
